tool_description: The SEO Audit Tool API is a powerful tool for analyzing the on-page SEO factors of a given website. It provides a comprehensive report with key metrics and insights to help users optimize their web pages for search engines. The API covers various aspects, including HTTP status, content analysis, metadata, page headings, word count, links summary, and images analysis.
name: SEO Audit Tool API
title: SEO Audit Tool API

api_list.name: Get SEO Report
api_list.description: Generate a Basic SEO Report for the given URL
